<img src="../../.gitbook/assets/Copy of Bitcoin Layers-modified.png" alt="" data-size="original">

#### **Tapestry of a Trustless Financial Era**

Diving deep into the layers of Bitcoin's blossoming ecosystem, the first edition of the Bitcoin Layers Report unveils the emerging reality of a financial world where trust is embedded in technology rather than institutions. As Bitcoin evolves beyond a Store of Value, we stand on the cusp of a revolution in trustless finance and a new era of economic possibilities.  [<mark style="background-color:orange;">https://bitcoinlayersreport.com/</mark>](https://bitcoinlayersreport.com/)

</details>
